title: State probe after George Floyd's killing finds a decade of 'discriminatory, race-based policing' in Minneapolis - CNN
content:
1. State probe after George Floyd's killing finds a decade of 'discriminatory, race-based policing' in Minneapolis  CNN
  2. Minneapolis Officers Found to Engage in Racist Policing  The New York Times
  3. Probe into George Floyd's death finds discrimination by police | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  4. Report: Minneapolis police engaged in pattern of illegal racial discrimination  Star Tribune
  5. New report outlines discrimination from MPD I KMSP FOX 9  FOX 9 Minneapolis-St. Paul
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A state investigation into the Minneapolis Police Department launched after the Memorial Day 2020 killing of George Floyd at the hands of a police officer revealed a pattern of "discriminatory, race-based policing" by officers going back a decade, according to a report released Wednesday.
